basics.name: Guillem Tutusaus Alcaraz
basics.label: Mathematician
basics.summary: Mathematician with a keen interest in science and technology who likes to programme and make projects in his free time.

work.name: VidaCaixa, S.A.U
work.summary: Leverage data-driven insights to enhance decision-making processes, improve operational efficiency, and support strategic initiatives. Whilst maintaining day-to-day business reports.

work.name: Biotecnal S.A.
work.summary: As part of my university internship. Studied consumer behavior, designing and controlling all kinds of products, allowed to respond to the demands of the market in front of consumers, manufacturers and distributors. Used IBM SPSS as well as MS Excel and R to make inference on data using diferent statistical tests.

work.name: Professors Particulars DAFME, Polytechnic University of Catalonia
work.summary: Collaborated with students to comprehend the lesson, identify lacking skills and correct weaknesses. Also prepared students for the University access exam (PAU).

volunteer.organization: International Council for Industrial and Applied Mathematics
volunteer.summary: In charge of coordinating the interventions of the congressmen who presented their research applied to different industries and fields. I particularly led lectures related to Stochastic Processes.

references.name: Professor Natàlia Castellana Vila
references.reference: Professor Castellana has been my teacher in General Topology and Modellization Methods.

references.name: Professor Isabel Serra Mochales
references.reference: Professor Serra Mochales has taught me courses in Statistics, sharing her expertise in foundational statistical concepts and methods.

references.name: Professor Joan Porti Piqué
references.reference: Professor Porti has served as my senior thesis director, where his guidance and knowledge about knots theory were invaluable.

projects.name: Knot Theory and the Jones Polynomial
projects.summary: A knot is a closed loop in three-dimensional space, similar to a piece of string whose ends are joined together, so it cannot be untied without cutting. Knot theory aims to understand and classify these knots mathematically.

projects.name: AI for Connect-4 Game
projects.summary: C implementation of the classic Connect 4 board game played on an 8x8 grid. The game features a single-player mode where you compete against an AI opponent. The AI uses a minimax algorithm with alpha-beta pruning to optimize its moves, providing a challenging experience.

projects.name: Construction of a Low-Cost Weather Balloon
projects.summary: Low-Cost Stratospheric Probe project, which aims to build a high-altitude weather balloon equipped with sensors and cameras, utilizing open-source hardware and software solutions whilst staying on budget.
